clues.category: THE U.S. CONGRESS WITH NANCY PELOSI
clues.clue: (Nancy Pelosi reads the clue.) I was the 52nd Speaker of the House & the first woman to hold the post since Congress convened in 1789 with 59 representatives; today, our 115th Congress has this many House members
